statements: SELECT * FROM Transactions;
SELECT transaction_date, amount FROM Transactions WHERE department_name = 'Marketing';
SELECT transaction_id, description FROM Transactions WHERE amount > 1000;
SELECT * FROM Transactions ORDER BY transaction_date DESC;
SELECT donor_name, amount, department_name FROM Transactions WHERE donor_name LIKE 'John%';
SELECT * FROM Transactions WHERE amount > 1000 ORDER BY transaction_date DESC
SELECT transaction_id, transaction_date, amount FROM Transactions WHERE department_name = 'Finance' ORDER BY amount DESC
SELECT transaction_id, donor_name FROM Transactions WHERE amount BETWEEN 500 AND 1000 AND department_name = 'HR'
SELECT description, amount FROM Transactions WHERE donor_name LIKE '%Smith%' AND department_name = 'Marketing' ORDER BY description ASC
SELECT department_name, COUNT(transaction_id) as transaction_count FROM Transactions GROUP BY department_name HAVING transaction_count > 10 ORDER BY transaction_count DESC
SELECT * FROM disaster_relief_transactions;
SELECT transaction_id, transaction_date, amount FROM disaster_relief_transactions;
SELECT description, amount FROM disaster_relief_transactions WHERE amount > 1000;
SELECT * FROM expenses WHERE category = 'Food';
SELECT expense_date, amount FROM expenses ORDER BY expense_date DESC;
SELECT * FROM disaster_relief_transactions WHERE amount > 1000 ORDER BY transaction_date DESC LIMIT 10;
SELECT description FROM disaster_relief_transactions WHERE transaction_date BETWEEN '2022-01-01' AND '2022-06-30';
SELECT transaction_id, amount FROM disaster_relief_transactions WHERE description LIKE '%donation%' ORDER BY transaction_date ASC;
SELECT SUM(amount) AS total_amount FROM expenses WHERE category = 'Food';
SELECT transaction_date, description FROM disaster_relief_transactions JOIN expenses ON disaster_relief_transactions.amount = expenses.amount;
SELECT donor_name, donation_amount FROM donations WHERE donation_amount > 1000
SELECT * FROM donations WHERE donor_name = 'John Doe'
SELECT donation_amount, donation_date FROM donations ORDER BY donation_date DESC
SELECT relief_id, location, total_expenses FROM disaster_relief WHERE total_expenses < 5000
SELECT * FROM expenses ORDER BY expense_date ASC
SELECT donor_name, donation_amount FROM donations WHERE donation_amount >= 1000 ORDER BY donation_amount DESC, donation_date ASC
SELECT donor_name, donation_amount, donation_date FROM donations ORDER BY donation_date DESC LIMIT 5
SELECT donor_name, donation_amount, donation_date FROM donations WHERE donor_name LIKE '%John%' OR donor_name LIKE '%Jane%' ORDER BY donation_date
SELECT expense_type, expense_amount FROM expenses WHERE expense_amount > 500 ORDER BY expense_amount DESC, expense_date ASC
SELECT relief_id, location, total_expenses FROM disaster_relief WHERE total_expenses > 10000 ORDER BY total_expenses DESC, relief_date ASC
SELECT * FROM disaster_area;
SELECT area_name, area_location FROM disaster_area WHERE area_id = 1;
SELECT * FROM relief_operations ORDER BY operation_date DESC;
SELECT operation_name, operation_location FROM relief_operations WHERE operation_date > '2022-01-01';
SELECT SUM(amount) AS total_expenses FROM financial_transactions WHERE transaction_type = 'expense';
SELECT * FROM disaster_area WHERE area_location = 'New York';
SELECT area_name, area_location FROM disaster_area WHERE area_id = 3 ORDER BY area_name DESC;
SELECT operation_name, operation_date FROM relief_operations WHERE operation_date >= '2022-01-01' AND operation_date <= '2022-06-30';
SELECT * FROM financial_transactions WHERE amount > 500 ORDER BY transaction_date ASC;
SELECT SUM(amount) AS total_expenses FROM expenses WHERE expense_date >= '2022-01-01' AND expense_date <= '2022-12-31';
SELECT * FROM financial_transactions;
SELECT transaction_id, transaction_date, amount, description FROM financial_transactions WHERE amount > 1000;
SELECT SUM(amount) AS total_amount FROM expenses;
SELECT operation_id, operation_name, start_date, end_date, location, status FROM disaster_operations ORDER BY start_date DESC;
SELECT category_name, description FROM transaction_categories WHERE category_id = 5;
SELECT * FROM financial_transactions WHERE amount > 1000
SELECT description, transaction_date, amount FROM financial_transactions ORDER BY transaction_date DESC
SELECT transaction_id, amount, description FROM financial_transactions WHERE transaction_date = '2022-01-15'
SELECT * FROM expenses WHERE category = 'Utilities' ORDER BY amount DESC
SELECT * FROM disaster_operations WHERE status = 'Active'
